name: Bowel Bob (Demo)
description:
*This game is in development!*

"Bowel Bob - The Power of Flatulence" is a hardcore 2D sidescrolling platformer game meticulously designed to frustrate you and have your bumhole constantly clenched.

However,  if you persevere long enough and master your bowel movements you will experience a state of full bliss, effortlessly conquering the game and showing it who's Boss.

Keyboard Input:

A/D or KB Left/Right: Run Left/Right.

Space: Jump.  (While grounded, your Jump will depend on how much you hold the button pressed. While in the air, you can jump once more, but the jump height is fixed)

R: Restart last checkpoint.

Escape/"P": Pause menu.

Gamepad Input:

D-Pad Left/Right: Run Left/Right.

Xbox "A"/ Ps4 "X": Jump.  (While grounded, your Jump will depend on how much you hold the button pressed. While in the air, you can jump once more, but the jump height is fixed)

Xbox "Select"/ Ps4 "Share": Restart last checkpoint.

Xbox "Start/ Ps4 "Options": Pause menu.

- This is a demo version of the game with one full level, i am a solo developer and self funded, so please consider donating if you would like to see the full game released with a ton of extra features. This would also help me release the game on multiple platforms including Ps4 and XB1.

I also appreciate all constructive feedback, so please let me know what you think in the comments or message me directly.

- Make sure you have high performance mode enabled in your power options, especially if you're playing on a laptop, as this game runs at 60fps.

Have fun and don't give up!
